entry.title: Welcome to Jekyll and EasyBook
entry.content:
Youâ€™ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext and includes the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.

GitHub Flavored Markdown is supported.

And Mathematics\mathcal{ Mathematics }Mathematics is supported!

Use $$ to wrap your formulas. For example, $e^{i\pi} + 1 = 0$ displays eiÏ€+1=0e^{i\pi} + 1 = 0eiÏ€+1=0

Multi-line forumlas are supported too.

J(w,b)=1mâˆ‘i=1mL(y^(i),y(i))+Î»2mâˆ‘l=1Lâˆ£âˆ£wâˆ£âˆ£F2âˆ£âˆ£wâˆ£âˆ£F2=âˆ‘i=1n[l]âˆ‘j=1n[lâˆ’1](wij)2\begin{aligned} & J(w, b) = \frac{1}{m} \sum_{i=1}^{m}L(\hat{y}^{(i)}, y^{(i)}) + \frac{\lambda}{2m} \sum_{l=1}^{L}{||w||}^2_F\\\\ & {||w||}^2_F = \sum_{i = 1}^{n[l]}\sum_{j = 1}^{n[l-1]}(w_{ij})^2 \end{aligned} â€‹J(w,b)=m1â€‹i=1âˆ‘mâ€‹L(y^â€‹(i),y(i))+2mÎ»â€‹l=1âˆ‘Lâ€‹âˆ£âˆ£wâˆ£âˆ£F2â€‹âˆ£âˆ£wâˆ£âˆ£F2â€‹=i=1âˆ‘n[l]â€‹j=1âˆ‘n[lâˆ’1]â€‹(wijâ€‹)2â€‹

EasyBook Advanced Functions

You are using EasyBook the template from laobubu.net. Therefore some features are supported now:

  • Pagination is enabled.
  • Disqus or å¤šè¯´ is ready.
  • TOC for posts is enabled.
  • Profile including your links and avatar on the sidebar.
  • And moreâ€¦

Tips: You can disable Disqus or å¤šè¯´ on posts/pages by adding nocomments: true into YAML Front Matter.

EasyBook uses upaiyun CDN to make everyone lncluding Chinese visitors feel speedy. You can find it in _includes/footer.html and change it to your favorite CDN like Google CDN.

Support me byâ€¦

Add a link

EasyBook does not make the footer heavy; the link to theme could be on about.md:

This website is using laobubuâ€™s theme: EasyBook

Donate (PayPal or æ”¯ä»˜å®)

Thatâ€™s the best ğŸ˜„

Please visit http://laobubu.net/donate.html

Star and Fork on GitHub (free)

Not going to donate? Thatâ€™s okay. You can also send out your precious star on GitHub.

And Here We Go

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyllâ€™s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyllâ€™s dedicated Help repository.

entry.title: Just make a contract with me, and become a Magical Girl!
entry.content:
Thatâ€™s horribleâ€¦

You canâ€™t help it.

One person canâ€™t handle this alone.

But she knew that and came here anyway.

No, this isnâ€™t right, itâ€™s too much for herâ€¦

If she gives up, itâ€™s over.

But, you have the power to change this destiny.

All this tragedy, all this destruction, you can change it, if you want.

The power to do so lies within you.

I can change it?

Even someone like me can do something to help?

Can I really change how this ends?

Of course, you can.

Just make a contract with me, and become a Magical Girl!



That was a crazy dreamâ€¦

Good morning, Dad.

Oh, good morning, Madoka.

Mom up yet?

Tatsuyaâ€™s waking her up.

He might need some help, though.

Okay.

Mama, mama!

Wake up, wake up!

Câ€™mon, mama!

Mama, mama!

Rise and shine!!

Urghhhhhhhh!!

â€¦What theâ€¦?

Mama woke up, yay!

Whatâ€™s happening in your world?

Well, Hitomi got another love letter.

Itâ€™s the second one this month.

Huh, if he canâ€™t say to her face, heâ€™s not worth it.

Howâ€™s Kazuko doing?

I think her new boyfriendâ€™s working out.

She canâ€™t seem to talk about anything else during homeroom.

This weekâ€™s their three months anniversary, so I guess thatâ€™s the record.

Oh I hope they can make it.

Theyâ€™re at a critical stage in their relationship.

They are?

If itâ€™s not the real thing, this is usually when it starts to fall apart.

But if they made it this far, they should be okay for another year.

Ohâ€¦

I look fabulous.

I wonder which ribbon I should wear.

Really?

Itâ€™s not too flashy?

Thereâ€™s no such thing as too flashy, hon.

A woman canâ€™t afford to get teased 'cause she looks sloppy.

Hah, perfect!

Your secret admirers are gonna get all wobbly and knees.

I donâ€™t have secret admirers.

But you should dress and behave like you do.

Thatâ€™s the secret every pretty girl should know.

Heheâ€¦

Ahâ€¦

Uh-oh!

Yay, safe!

Now be good, and eat it all up, okay?

Okay!

Hey honey, some more coffee?

Uhâ€¦

I better not.

All right!

Iâ€™m off to work, everyone.

Have a good day, honey.

Bye, mama.

Hey, youâ€™re gonna be late if you donâ€™t hurry.

Huh?!

Oh yeah.

See you later!

Have a great day!

Have a great day!



Good morning, guys!

Good morning.

What took you so long, Madoka?

Look at you with your cute ribbons.

You think so?

Theyâ€™re not too flashy?

I think they look lovely.

My mom said that if a boy canâ€™t say he loves you to your face, heâ€™s not worth your time.

Your mom is way cool, Madoka!

I mean sheâ€™s smart, gorgeous and successful.

If only I could make up my mind as easily as that.

If only everyone could have your problems.

You know, she is right.

I wish someone would send me a love letter some time.

Itâ€™d be nice to get one.

Ah, now I get it.

You want to be as beautiful and popular as Hitomi, donâ€™t ya?

I bet thatâ€™s why youâ€™re wearing those ribbons to change your image.

Thatâ€™s not true!

My mom picked these out andâ€¦

You tricked your mom to tell you the secret to being popular, didnâ€™t you?

Iâ€™m not gonna let that happen!

Ha!

No!

No, stop it!

No!

Youâ€™re just too cute!

Iâ€™m not gonna let you be popular with the boys.

Youâ€™re mine, Madoka!

Mine, mine, mine.

Ahem.

Ahem.



I have a very important issue to discuss today.

So eyes front, ears open!

The correct way to fry an egg is sunny side up or down.

Come on, Nakazawa. I donâ€™t have all day.

Iâ€¦ I gueâ€¦ uhâ€¦

You can fry either way, canâ€™t you?

Yes, precisely.

You can fry either way!

Therefore, go through without saying that you should never judge a womenâ€™s beauty by the way she fries her eggs.

Remember, girls, do not associate with men who refuse to eat eggs thatâ€™s been fried sunny side down.

I guess it didnâ€™t work out.

But what gave you that idea?

And you boys, better make sure you donâ€™t grow up to be men who complain about how the damn eggs are cooked, understand?!

Well, now that thatâ€™s out of the way, letâ€™s give a big warm welcome to our new classmate!

Uh, maybe that shouldâ€™ve come first?

Come in, Miss Akemi.

Donâ€™t be shy!

Wow!

Wow, sheâ€™s super gorgeous.

Huh?

No way!

It couldnâ€™t be!

Why donâ€™t you tell the class a little bit about yourself.

Iâ€™m Homura Akemi.

Itâ€™s nice to meet you.

Uhâ€¦

Umâ€¦

Uh, Miss Akemi?



What school did you go to before coming to this one?

I went to a private Catholic school in Tokyo.

Were you in a club?

How about sports?

Were you on any teams?

No, not really.

Your hair is really beautiful!

What kind of shampoo do you like to use?

Thereâ€™s something awfully mysterious about that girl, donâ€™t you think?

Hey, Madoka, do you know that girl?

I couldâ€™ve sworn to you she was glaring at you when she was in front of the class.

Well, Iâ€™m not really sureâ€¦

Iâ€™m sorry.

I think todayâ€™s been a little stressful for me.

Iâ€™m not feeling very well.

May I please go to the Nurseâ€™s Office?

Ah, sure.

If you want, I can take you over there.

Good idea!

Can I come too?

Please donâ€™t trouble yourselves.

Iâ€™ll ask the Nurseâ€™s Aide to take me.

Huh?

Miss Madoka Kaname.

You are the Nurseâ€™s Aide for this class, are you not?

Huh?

Um, wellâ€¦

I uhâ€¦

Would you please come with me?

To the Nurseâ€™s Office.

Um, Iâ€¦wasâ€¦

H-How did you know I was the Nurseâ€™s Aide for the class?

Ms Saotome told me that you were.

Oh, right, of course she did.

By the way, the Nurseâ€™s Office is over there.

This way, right?

Huh?

Uh, yeah, thatâ€™s right.

But, umâ€¦

So anyway, how do you know your way there?

I mean youâ€™re new here and all.

Umâ€¦Miss, umâ€¦Akemi?

Call me Homura.

Oh, Homura.

What is it?

Uh, nothing. Itâ€™s just thatâ€¦you have an unusual name.

But not in a bad way or anything, I was just thinking how it sounded coolâ€¦

for a first name, I mean.

Madoka Kaname, do you treasure the life you currently live?

And do you consider your family and your friends precious?

Oh, well, I uhâ€¦

Of course I do.

I mean I-I do.

My family and my friends, I love them very much and yes theyâ€™re very precious to me.

Do you mean it?

Absolutely.

I couldnâ€™t lie about that!

Good.

Because if thatâ€™s the truth, then you wouldnâ€™t try changing the life you have or the person you are.

Otherwise, youâ€™d lose everything you love.

Huh?

Donâ€™t change.

Stay as you are, Madoka Kaname.

Stay as you are, forever.



Wowâ€¦

Wowâ€¦

She breaks the record of every school in this city?!

I canâ€™t believe you can jump that high!



She said what?!

It doesnâ€™t make any sense, does it?

When I was thinking she was this awesome girl but it turns out she is a total psycho!

Ah! I hope she doesnâ€™t think acting like a weird transfer student is cool.

Thatâ€™s so MOE? It makes me sick!

This has to be misunderstanding.

Are you positive youâ€™ve never met her before?

Hmmâ€¦

I guess the sensible answer will be â€œyes.â€

Okay, what do you mean by sensible?

Either you met her or you didnâ€™t?

Well, itâ€™s likeâ€¦

Youâ€™re gonna think Iâ€™m weird but I first met her in a dream or something.

Hahahahaâ€¦ Thatâ€™s awesome!

An anime character in youâ€™s popping out, too!

Come on, thatâ€™s mean!

This is really bugging me!

I got it all figured out.

You guys knew each other in the past life and the fate is reached across time and space to bring you back together again.

In your dream, what happened when you met her?

Thatâ€™s the thing. I canâ€™t really remember what happened in it.

All I know is that was really strange and spooky.

If you want my opinion, I think itâ€™s entirely possibly you met Miss Akemi somewhere before.

Huh?!

You might not remember meeting her, but your subconscious certainly took note of it.

When you were having that dream, your subconscious simply brought up the image of her.

Seriously?

Thatâ€™s the heck of coincidence, donâ€™t you think?

Uh, perhaps.

Uh-oh, look how late itâ€™s gotten.

Excuse me, but I really should be going now.

Is it Piano today or classical dance?

Tea Ceremony lessons today.

Even though our Exams are coming up, my mother still wants me to continue taking them.

Yeah, thereâ€™s another reason to be glad I wasnâ€™t born a rich girl.

We should get going too.

Madoka, you wanna hit the music store on the way home?

Okay.

Something for Kyosuke again?

Yeah, maybe.

Have fun shopping!

Bye bye!

Later!



Help me!

Huh?

Madoka, help me!

Huh?

What?!

Pleaseâ€¦help me!

Huh?

Hello?

Who are you?

Help meâ€¦!

Where are you?

Um, do I know you?

Help me!

Is that you?

Help meâ€¦

Homura?

Get away from that creature.

B-But heâ€™s really hurt.

Leave him alone.

Why are you trying to hurt him?

This doesnâ€™t concern you.

But he was calling me!

I could hear him calling my name!

He was asking me to help him!

Really?

Over here, Madoka!

Sayaka!

Why is this happening now?

Now sheâ€™s attacking you on cosplay?

Whatâ€™s her problem?

And whatâ€™s that thing youâ€™re carrying?

Looks like a stuffed animal. Is it alive?

I donâ€™t know.

I donâ€™t know why this is happening, but we have to save him!

Whereâ€™d the exit go?

Where are we?

I donâ€™t like this place.

Everything keeps changing!

Oh, crap!

What the heckâ€™s going on?!

Thereâ€™s something over there!

Is this some kinda joke, right?

Iâ€™m stuck in a bad dream, but I am dreaming, right?

Right, Madoka?!

Whatâ€™s happening?

I donâ€™t know.

That was close, wasnâ€™t it?

But donâ€™t worry, youâ€™re safe now.

Thank goodness.

You rescued Kyubey for me.

Iâ€™m very grateful.

Heâ€™s a dear friend of mine and I was so worried.

He called out to me.

I could hear his voice inside my head.

Ahh, I see.

I can tell by your uniforms that you both go to Mitakihara Middle School.

Are you 8th graders?

Who are you?

Oh, thatâ€™s right.

Maybe I should introduce myself.

Actually, itâ€™s going to have to wait a bit.

Please excuse me.

I have to wrap this up first.

Wow, amazing!

Weâ€™re back!

The witch managed to escape.

If you wanna finish it off, youâ€™d better go after it.

I wonâ€™t mind if you take it this time.

But I still have work to do here.

You donâ€™t understand, do you?

Iâ€™m telling you Iâ€™m willing to overlook this.

Honestly, donâ€™t you think it would be best if we didnâ€™t do this right now?

Thank you, Mami!

Youâ€™re a lifesaver!

Iâ€™m not the one you should be thanking.

They saved you.

I was just passing by.



Thank you very much!

My name is Kyubey.

Were you the one who was calling for help?

Thatâ€™s right, Madoka Kaname,

And Sayaka Miki.

Wow, hang on a sec.

How do you know our names?

I came here because I have a favor to ask of you both.

Huh?

What do you mean?

I want you to make contracts with me, and become magical girls!

4. Prohibited Use

The following behavior is prohibited:

  1. Hosting or accessing content that:
  • â€¦
  1. Abusing the service and its resources, or using jsDelivr as a general-purpose file or media hosting service. This includes, for example:
  • running an image hosting website and using jsDelivr as a storage for all uploaded images,
  • hosting videos, file backups, or other files in large quantities.
    We recognize that there are legitimate projects that consist of a large number of files, and these are not considered abuse. For example: icons packs, apps, or games with a large number of assets.
  1. Trying to bypass our limits or restrictions in any way. We will be happy to remove limits or provide custom solutions for legitimate projects.

5. Additional Restrictions in China

jsDelivr holds an ICP license issued by the Chinese government, which allows us to operate infrastructure directly in Mainland China. To keep this license and allow our Chinese users to benefit from the performance improvements it provides, any content served via our Chinese network must conform to Chinese policies. Content potentially violating Chinese policies may be blocked in China without warning.

entry.title: ã€å°èŠ±ä»™ã€‘ç¬”è®°ï¼šChrome 62 æ–°å¢äº†å¯¹æŒ‡å®šHTMLå…ƒç´ æˆªå›¾çš„åŠŸèƒ½
entry.content:
æ¥æºï¼š

New features and changes coming to DevTools in Chrome 62:

  • Support for top-level await operators in the Console.
  • Screenshots of a portion of the viewport, and screenshots of specific HTML nodes.
  • CSS Grid highlighting.
  • A new Console API for querying objects.
  • Negative filters and URL filters in the Console.
  • HAR imports in the Network panel.
  • Previewable cache resources.
  • More predictable cache debugging.
  • Block-level code coverage.

entry.title: å¾®è½¯ç­”åº”2021å¹´å†ç»™Flashç»­å‘½å‡ ä¸ªæœˆ
entry.content:
æ¥æºï¼š

Options for continued support for enterprise customers é’ˆå¯¹ä¼ä¸šç”¨æˆ·çš„ç»§ç»­æ”¯æŒï¼ˆFlashï¼‰çš„æ–¹å¼

For enterprises seeking assistance with moving away from Adobe Flash Player or needing continued support for line of business applications that may be dependent on it after 2020, Adobe is providing some support options. For more details, please visit the blog posted by Adobe.
å¯¹äºé‚£äº›åœ¨2020å¹´åéœ€è¦ååŠ©è„±ç¦»Adobe Flash Playeræˆ–éœ€è¦ç»§ç»­æ”¯æŒå¯èƒ½ä¾èµ–å®ƒçš„ä¸šå†…ä¸šåŠ¡åº”ç”¨çš„ä¼ä¸šç”¨æˆ·ï¼ŒAdobeæä¾›äº†ä¸€äº›æ–¹å¼ã€‚æ›´å¤šè¯¦æƒ…è¯·è®¿é—®Adobeå‘å¸ƒçš„åšå®¢ã€‚

To aid such customers, Microsoft Edge will allow Adobe Flash Player to load as a plug-in via the Internet Explorer mode feature. Inherently, Internet Explorer 11 will also allow this. Once you make the switch from Microsoft provided Adobe Flash Player, it will be treated as any other third-party plug-in and will not receive Customer Support from Microsoft.
ä¸ºäº†ååŠ©æ­¤ç±»ç”¨æˆ·ï¼ŒMicrosoft Edgeå°†å…è®¸é€šè¿‡IEæ¨¡å¼åŠŸèƒ½å°†Adobe Flash Playerä½œä¸ºæ’ä»¶æ¥åŠ è½½ï¼ŒIE11åŸç”Ÿä¹Ÿæ¥å—è¿™ç§è¦æ±‚ã€‚å¦‚æœæ‰“å¼€å¾®è½¯æä¾›çš„Adobe Flash Playerï¼Œå®ƒå°†è¢«è§†åŒå…¶ä»–ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹æ’ä»¶æ¥å¯¹å¾…ï¼Œä¸ä¼šå—åˆ°å¾®è½¯çš„å®¢æˆ·æ”¯æŒã€‚

â€¦

In Summer of 2021, all the APIs, group polices and user interfaces that specifically govern the behavior of Adobe Flash Player will be removed from Microsoft Edge (legacy) and Internet Explorer 11 via the latest â€œCumulative Updateâ€ on Windows 10 platforms and via â€œCumulative Update for Internet Explorer 11â€ or â€œMonthly Rollupâ€ on Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 and Windows Embedded 8 Standard. Also, the â€œUpdate for Removal of Adobe Flash Playerâ€ will be included as part of the â€œCumulative Updateâ€ and â€œMonthly Rollupâ€ this point forward. If you are working with Adobe for continued support, you should not be impacted by these changes.

Taking screenshots æˆªå›¾

To capture a screenshot of a page, use the --screenshotflag:
è¦å¯¹é¡µé¢æˆªå›¾ï¼Œåªéœ€ä½¿ç”¨--screenshotå‚æ•°å³å¯ï¼š

Running with --screenshotwill produce a file named screenshot.pngin the current working directory. If youâ€™re looking for full page screenshots, things are a tad more involved.
